text: The Perfect Sap is a 1927 American comedy film directed by Howard Higgin. It is based on the 1926 play Not Herbert by Howard Irving Young. The film stars Ben Lyon, Virginia Lee Corbin, Lloyd Whitlock, Diana Kane, Byron Douglas and Christine Compton.
